name: Magic Mirrorcle
description:
In this co-op multiplayer game, you must work together and destroy the rune stones to progress deeper into the dungeon to collect the final treasure. Bounce your arrow off the mirrors and your partner's shield to get a combo going that will destroy the rune stone. The combo to obtain is shown at the top. Good luck adventurers!

Developers: Nijastan Kirupa, Khizer Mahboob

3D Artist: Philip Petrunak

Sound: Rob Ainsley

Made using Unreal Engine 4
